item.title: defense in depth
item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about defense in depth ChatGPT answer: What is the concept of defense in depth and how does it relate to computer security? What are some examples of the different layers that can be used in a defense in depth approach, and how do they function? How can individual employees contribute to a company’s defense in depth strategy, and what role does employee training play?
